activities:
We provide software services to schools.

¦When you register with the Service, we ask for information such as your name, school, and email address. A billing address and credit card information will be required for paying primary account holders; Subscribers who sign up for the free trial account are not required to enter a credit card or billing address.
¦We use collected information for the following general purposes: provision of our services, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research.
¦If a child is under the age of 13, a parent or legal guardian MUST consent to the child’s use of the Service, as provided for in the Terms of Service. Any personal information identified with the student (such as: email address, first and last name, etc.) that we collect will be subject to the additional COPPA Compliance Policy, available at: http://www.managebac.com/terms.html.
¦We will not provide personal information to third parties.
¦By using their student account, a student and/or parent has the ability to send personal information (such as: first and last name, email address, and parents' names) to their teacher with a teacher account, and to other students. This is done on a voluntary basis, and that information will not be provided to any third parties by us.

recoursemech: We have registered with the US Council for International Business, in order to utilize the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) for dispute resolution.
